message.entry: Error creating the ROS 2 node {0}. ROS 2 is only supported on Windows 10.
Unable to communicate with ROS 2 to start node {0}. Clear the node and recreate it.
Invalid response from the ROS 2 network. Clear the node and recreate it.
Invalid node reference returned from the ROS 2 network. Clear the node and recreate it.
An error occurred while requesting information on the ROS 2 node.
ROS 2 network is no longer accessible by the node object. Recreate the node.
Invalid network reference stored by the ROS 2 node. Recreate the node.
